SCTX - Script Source:
SCN mwShrineGnisisScript

; Shrine of the Mask
; Applied to the tribunal shrine associated with the quest.
; This script is minimally functional and still mostly in Morrowind Scripting Language.
; It can be reworked when the Dunmer Temple quests are rebuilt.

short button
short questionState

Begin OnActivate

	if ( questionState == 0 )

		if Player.GetItemCount 0pUcureUcommonUs == 0 && Player.GetItemCount PotionCureDisease == 0 
			MessageBox "Here in Gnisis Vivec made a potion to cure a villager who had fallen ill but could not pay for the healing of the Temple. Vivec promised that the Temple would always cure those who could not pay and left his sacred Mask here as a sign of that promise."
			Set questionState to 0
			Return
		Else
			MessageBox "Would you like to donate a Potion of Cure Disease and ask for a blessing?" "Yes" "No"
			Set questionState to 1
		endif

	endif

End


Begin GameMode

	if questionState == 0
		return
	endif

	if ( questionState == 1 )

		set button to GetButtonPressed

		if button == 0 && questionState == 1 && Player.GetItemCount 0pUcureUcommonUs > 0 
			Player.RemoveItem 0pUcureUcommonUs 1 
			Cast 0shrineUgnisisUsp Player
			MessageBox "The Grace of Justice: Thank you for your justice, Lord Vivec. I shall be neither cruel nor arbitrary, for fair dealing earns the love, trust, and respect of our people."
			SetStage fbmwTTSevenGraces 13
			Set questionState to 0
		ElseIf button == 0 && questionState == 1 && Player.GetItemCount PotionCureDisease > 0
			Player.RemoveItem PotionCureDisease 1 
			Cast 0shrineUgnisisUsp Player
			Message "Your body is freed from illness and poison!"
			MessageBox "The Grace of Justice: Thank you for your justice, Lord Vivec. I shall be neither cruel nor arbitrary, for fair dealing earns the love, trust, and respect of our people."
			SetStage fbmwTTSevenGraces 13
			Set questionState to 0
		ElseIf ( button == 1 )
			Set questionState to 0
			Return
		endif

	endif

End
;<CSEBlock>
;<CSECaretPos> 0 </CSECaretPos>
;</CSEBlock>
